text: @PGATOUR so we have testing that's instantaneous for PGA tour players for #COVID19, but the rest of us just...hope and pray?

entity.name: RBC Heritage, Second Round
entity.description: Harbour Town Golf Links hosts second-round action at the RBC Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C. This year's field includes a lot of firepower as 16 of the 20 highest-ranked players in the world, including No. 1 Rory McIlroy, are on the course.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
